Don't come here just to complain about my behavior, Jaime Bayly says angrily over the outro music.`` And don't be so damned boring.'' Jaime Bayly is a man of many parts. He's both David Letterman and Charles Grandison Rose III ; comedian and serious interviewer;

Allen Iverson , who entered shooting 42.1 percent and averaging 30.5 points, shot 2-for-20 in the first three quarters and 5-of-28 overall along with 10-of-14 from the foul line. He also had four steals and committed four turnovers. It's a game that I want to forget, but it's a game I'll probably remember for the rest of my life because it was one of the worst games I've ever played, Allen Iverson said.`` But I'm happy because we got the win. A decision about who will join Simon Cowell on the four-member panel has yet to be made and won't be announced for another month or so, he said during an interview and teleconference about The X Factor. The show debuts this fall. Simon Cowell exited Fox's`` American Idol'' last season in part to focus on the new series, which has been a successful format in several countries

lawmakers who were in Gabrielle Giffords ' hospital room when she opened her eyes were three of her close female friends in Congress: House Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi of California, Rep. Debbie Wasserman Schultz , D-Fla., and Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand , D-N.Y. The doctors couldn't believe it, Debbie Wasserman Schultz later told CNN.`` It was the most incredible experience that I have ever had.'' Gabrielle Giffords is expected to survive, although her condition and the extent of her recovery remain in doubt.

Mit Blick auf Konkurrenten wie Facebook sagte Eric Schmidt : Die Internet-Suche wird weiter sehr wichtig bleiben. Google werde sein Kerngesch?ft mit Online-Werbung st?rken, sagte der Manager in einem anschlie?enden Gespr?ch mit Journalisten und nannte dabei neben der Videoportal-Tochter YouTube auch die Display-Werbung, also die Platzierung von Anzeigen mit Bildern oder Videos auf Web-Seiten.
